document_data.name: ''One Night in Nashkel''
document_data.mainbody: '''''One Night in Nashkel''''' was a pulp erotica book found in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Contents: The book held a fictional account of the [[Evereska]]n [[elf]] [[Xan]] and his imprisonment in the [[Nashkel mines]] during the [[Iron crisis]]. The tale goes that after months of isolation, Xan finally seeks pleasure with [[Xan's moonblade|his sentient moonblade]].
document_data.History: A copy was kept in the library of the [[Sharess' Caress]] brothel in [[1492 DR]].
